# Support for FireLink System

## Documentation
- [User Guide](https://docs.firelinksystem.com/user-guide)
- [API Documentation](https://docs.firelinksystem.com/api)
- [UK Compliance Guide](https://docs.firelinksystem.com/compliance)

## Community Support
- [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/firelinksystem/firelink-system/discussions) - Ask questions and share knowledge
- [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/firelinksystem/firelink-system/issues) - Report bugs and request features

## Professional Support
For UK fire and security companies requiring professional support:

### Email Support
- **Technical Support**: support@firelinksystem.com
- **Sales & Onboarding**: sales@firelinksystem.com
- **Compliance Questions**: compliance@firelinksystem.com
- **Emergency Support**: emergency@firelinksystem.com (24/7 for critical system issues)

### Phone Support
- **UK Main**: +44 (0) 1234 567890
- **Emergency Line**: +44 (0) 1234 567891

### Support Hours
- **Standard Support**: Monday-Friday, 9:00-17:00 GMT
- **Emergency Support**: 24/7 for critical system outages

## UK Compliance Support
Our compliance team specializes in:
- BS5839 Fire Alarm Standards
- Emergency Lighting Compliance
- Gas Safety Regulations (if applicable)
- UK VAT and tax compliance
- Document generation and storage

## Training and Onboarding
We offer:
- Online training sessions
- On-site implementation support
- Custom workflow configuration
- Compliance certification setup

## Service Level Agreement (SLA)
- **Critical Issues**: 2-hour response time, 4-hour resolution target
- **High Priority**: 4-hour response time, 8-hour resolution target
- **Standard Issues**: 8-hour response time, 24-hour resolution target

## Emergency Contact for UK Companies
For urgent issues affecting your business operations, please use our emergency contact channels. We understand the critical nature of fire and security business operations.

## Contributing
We welcome contributions from the community! Please see our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.

## Status Page
Check our system status at [status.firelinksystem.com](https://status.firelinksystem.com)
